title: Keeping Your Heart Pure | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Keeping Your Heart Pure | Joel Osteen
description:
If you want to step into the next level of your destiny, you have to pay attention to the condition of your inner life. What’s going on inside you is more important than what’s going on around you.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
